subject: Families and Family Life
Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: From Press and Pete Maravich to Bob and Pat Knight, college basketball is littered with stories about fathers and sons. But the untold tale behind them is the juggling act of the wife and mother.
snippet: From Press and Pete Maravich to Bob and Pat Knight, college basketball is littered with stories about fathers and sons. But the untold tale behind them is the juggling act of the wife and mother.
